name: Linen Loose Cover for Beale 2-Seater Sofa – Aqua
description: This stylish Loose Linen Slipcover is designed to fit our Beale 2-seater Sofa's elegant, low-sitting frame. The Beale has an intrinsic ability to pull off every cut, shade and fabric imaginable, which makes it the perfect piece to dress with our loose linen covers. Our Aqua Stonewashed Linen slipcover brings tranquil tones to the material, which, as the name suggests, is tumbled with stones for a textured finish.
